fields.title: Big Boy Cake

fields.body: When it comes to hydration, there's just no beating water.
fields.title: Scrumptious Water

fields.name: Big Boy Cake
fields.ingredients_text:
- 1 cup flour
- 1 cup sugar
- 100 eggs
- 1 liter vanilla extract
fields.instructions:
- Mix everything in a gigantic bowl. Use your hands for optimum flavor penetration.
- Cook it on a skillet for 4 hours until it looks like the picture.
fields.description: A rich, sensual, red-ass cake. Boys only, please.

fields.name: Glass of Water
fields.instructions:
- Mix ingredients into a vessel with at least a 32 ounce capacity.
- Serve chilled.
